text: qareeb hai ki bijalee unakee onkhon ko chaundhiya de jab unake aage bijalee chamakee to us raushanee mein chal khade hue aur jab un par andhera chha gaya to (thithake ke) khade ho gae aur khuda chaahata to yoon bhee unake dekhane aur sunane kee koovaten chheen leta beshak khuda har cheez par qaadir hai
